entry.title: PUBG: Battlegrounds Celebrates Sixth Anniversary With Detailed Stats
entry.content:
PUBG: Battlegrounds is celebrating its sixth anniversary with a slew of stats covering specific milestones over the years. The battle royale shooter is available in 242 countries, and has sold over 75 million units across PC and consoles. On Steam, PUBG: Battlegrounds reached an impressive concurrent player peak of 3.25 million, and was selected as one of the platform's most-played games and top-selling IP for six years in a row. Alongside the news of these milestones, PUBG: Battlegrounds' 22.2 update went live on consoles today, which includes server fixes, map service, gameplay balancing, and the new Famas assault rifle. The 22.2 update also adds map changes including billboards, more hills on Deston, and even a dirt racetrack to the peninsula south of Sancara. In addition, a new Progressive Weapon Skin for the AUG has been implemented. Referred to as Neon Dream, this weapon skin will appear as a world spawn item, allowing players to customize it after earning the Progressive Skin. Likewise, a new BLACKPINK skin bundle has been added, featuring all four members of the K-pop group. PUBG: Battlegrounds launched as PlayerUnknown's Battlegrounds in 2017 and is one of the leading battle royale games, inspiring dozens of others since its release.


PUBG: Battlegrounds 6週年慶典


PUBG: Battlegrounds透過一系列的數據統計慶祝公司6週年，指出這款全球大熱的大逃殺遊戲在242個國家都有受眾，尤其在PC和主機上共售出超過7,500萬份。PUBG在Steam上，創下了325萬的同時玩家最高紀錄，並被選為平台內最受歡迎的遊戲之一，連續六年位居暢銷IP榜首。 PUBG: Battlegrounds累積共有1.5.07億註冊用戶，總共累積近16.3億小時的遊玩時間。展現這些里程碑的同時，PUBG: Battlegrounds的22.2更新已於今日上線主機，提供一系列伺服器修補、地圖服務、遊戲平衡等等更新。此次的22.2更新，還加入了新的Famas突擊步槍，加到已有的武器庫中，像是進取的步槍(AUG)亦新增了新的進化武器外觀。BLACKPINK皮膚包也成為了更新中新增的一項內容。



詳細句子文法解析：



  • PUBG is celebrating / its sixth anniversary : 現在分詞用來作為「通过、用、附带完成某个动作或说明某种特征的动作的有形描述」，
    用来分割出 or join deals 时间段或时间，此处连接词为with


  • The battle royal shooter is available in 242 countries : passive voice强调动作而非承受动作的对象


  • It has sold over 75 million units across PC and consoles : tense一般过去式、数较多的表达方式using more than


  • PUBG on Steam reached an impressive concurrent player peak : 因為有定量的意義，所以使用獨立謂語作為主語


  • PUBG was selected as one of the platform's most-played games : 被選中則是动作，所以用passive form，定语从句来解释platform


  • In total, PUBG: Battlegrounds is home to 150.7 million registered users who have played a combined 16.3 billion hours : 現在進行式表現經驗持續不斷，故後面的動詞用完成時。


  • Alongside the news of these milestones, PUBG... went live on consoles today : 原文一體表示注重的點，必須柔和表現，將"這些里程碑的"承前启后，改為总的回顧



單字：



  • Battlegrounds：戰場，戰鬥區域

  • slew: 大量的，熱氣騰騰的

  • specific: 特定的，明確的，具體的

  • milestone:里程碑，重要事件

  • concurrent: 同時發生的

  • impressive: 令人印象深刻的

  • registered: 註冊的，掛號的，特指過去事情或經歷

  • spawn:萌生，發生

  • customize: 客製化

  • implement: 實施，套用



單字應變法：



  • Battlegrounds：可以，聯想成天幕紅顏之類流行的『紅顏』題材，把battle改為女孩執劍的意象

  • slew: （中文單字命名為 "爆水花" 來源：因直觀而易記憶的水晶球售賣場)

  • specific: 針對某件事物保有明確的印象，聯想到一仙女針劍刺破對方胸口，並重複告訴其他人 --說明她走到後方有一路砂子！

  • milestone: found a stack of mouldy stones 可知這些紀念碑標誌著重要的歷史事件

  • concurrent：聯想成兩條火車同時到站，通過現場附近的樓房

  • regiatered: （音愛gist~習慣想起使用&pk+fort不就知道我在調音！）

  • spawn：從地下出生，存續成事的良機

  • customize: 意象成開心果慕斯配合卡士達的save&radeon...我奇怪的想像

  • implement：即實施，也可以看起來像繁榮之源、花園藝術、指要有築城大臣在陪伴



相似及反義片語：



  • 相似：most-played & best-selling 都有代表出至少超過一类形的成功成果。

  • 反義：「排除在外,拒絕參與」所用片語指出可以玩或參加但被「excluded from」，而"Block" 和 "Banned" 则更為強烈意义的表示極被"疏遠"



日文測驗



  • Battlegrounds：戦闘嵐士 (sento ranshi)

  • slew：大量 (tairyou)

  • specific：特定、特異 (tokutei, tokui)

  • impressive：印象的な、感情が深い (inshou-teki-na, kan-jyou-ga-fukai)

  • registered：登録済みの、受診の (touroku-zumi-no, uke-jin-no)

  • spawn：異物 (iban-goto)

  • customize：カスタマイズ (kasutamaizu)

  • implement：施行する (shikou-suru)
